amendatorysection.catchline: Record; amendment, expunction, or removal; notice.
amendatorysection.para: Written notice of any amendment, expunction, or removal of any record in the central register of child protection cases maintained pursuant to section 28-718 shall be served upon the subject of the report of child abuse or neglect. The department shall inform any other individuals or agencies which received such record of any amendment, expunction, or removal of such record.
